overview: This DVD features the instantly recognisable names and faces of the US Kings Of Comedy: Adam Sandler, Chris Rock, Jerry Seinfeld, Tim Allen, Kelsey Grammer, Denis Leary, Jim Carey, Drew Carey, Billy Crystal, Rob Schneider and Jeff Foxworthy. Hilarious stand up footage taken from top comedy clubs across America as well USA network comedy series.
tagline: The Best of American Stand Up
title: Kings of Comedy USA
